MeasurementToolMetadata.Description:
LPS-2 subtest 3
Leistungsprüfsystem 2 – logical deductive thinking
Questionnaire A, subtest 3 (part of Gf: fluid intelligence)

Reference:
Kreuzpointner, L., Lukesch, H., Horn, W. (2013) Leistungsprüfsystem 2. Hogrefe Verlag GmbH & Co. KG

Assess logical deductive thinking.

Task description:
40 rows with 8 symbols each were presented. Participants had to identify, in each of the rows, the one symbol which did not fit. Time limit for the task (40 raws): 3 min.

LPS_1.Description: LPS raw data, how many symbol-rows did the participant process correctly
